pkgmetadata.longdescription: Confidence Intervals for a Binomial Proportion // Twelve confidence intervals for one binomial proportion or a vector of binomial proportions are computed. The confidence intervals are: Jeffreys, Wald, Wald corrected, Wald, Blyth and Still, Agresti and Coull, Wilson, Score, Score corrected, Wald logit, Wald logit corrected, Arcsine and Exact binomial. References include, among others: Vollset, S. E. (1993). "Confidence intervals for a binomial proportion". Statistics in Medicine, 12(9): 809-824. doi:10.1002/sim.4780120902.
